name: Emma's Umbrella
description:
Welcome to Emma's Umbrella game

Emma's Umbrella is a precision platformer where you'll overcome challenges to help our friend Emma get home.

This is a demo version of the game that is about 4 minutes long. The game is still in development, so there might be some bugs, but feel free to leave a comment or send me a private message on Twitter or Instagram if you find any bugs.

Please leave your feedback in the comments. Let's play videos are also appreciated!

 

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/GaYtcCtV

Twitter:https://twitter.com/__marcusmoreira

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/emmaumbrella/?hl=pt-br

  

Installation Instructions

Extract the zip file anywhere on your computer and run the 'Emma'sUmbrella.exe' file. Hope you'll enjoy your playthrough!
